comments:
Build 200301151011

I get the following error while doing 'Synchronize all CVS projects with their
repositories' (magic button in the toolbar).
Closing and relaunching eclipse solve the problem.


java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
        at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
        at
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.<init>(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.java)
        at java.util.Random.nextInt(Random.java)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Misc.random(Misc.java)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Client.send_SSH_CMSG_SESSION_KEY(Client.java)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Client.receive_SSH_SMSG_PUBLIC_KEY(Client.java:578)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Client.login(Client.java:495)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Client.connect(Client.java)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.SSHServerConnection.open(SSHServerConnection.java:76)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.Connection.open(Connection.java:123)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.createConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:155)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.openConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:349)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Session.open(Session.java:300)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.buildTree(RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.java:213)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.buildRemoteTree(RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.java:151)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.CVSWorkspaceRoot.getRemoteSyncTree(CVSWorkspaceRoot.java:613)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput.createSyncElements(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:283)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.SyncCompareInput.prepareInput(SyncCompareInput.java:208)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput.access$3(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:1)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput$6.run(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:390)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSUIPlugin.runWithRefresh(CVSUIPlugin.java:158)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput$5.run(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:388)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Session.run(Session.java:169)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput.prepareInput(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:385)
        at org.eclipse.compare.CompareEditorInput.run(CompareEditorInput.java:309)
        at
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:95)

This is strange. From the traceback, it look like an exception in 
java.util.Random.nextInt which is a system class. What Java version are you 
using.

The fact that this is occuring on a line that does an array assignment in 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Misc.random makes me wonder if the traceback 
is faulty but we need more to go on to know for sure.
It's possible that come from the VM, I'm using J9-sidecar to run eclipse.
*** Bug 30611 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Note from our J9 team:

"We are using the Hursley java.util.Random class. Can you try a Hursley SR3 
drop to see if it has the same problem?"
Worked ok for me on Win32 and Linux-GTK with IBM 1.3.1 SR3.

That was a one-time-only problem, I thought this report could help you to find a
weakness.

I suggest to close the bug.

A reproduceable case is required for action on this.  Closing since it doesn't 
sound like we have one.  Seems the resolution "worksforme" is the least 
innacurate.

If we think we have one we can reopen.
